short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: With SafeMessage, you can write secure messages on the internet.
short.de: Mit SafeMessage können Sie sichere Nachrichten im Internet schreiben.
short.es: Con SafeMessage, puedes escribir mensajes seguros en Internet.
short.fr: Avec SafeMessage, vous pouvez écrire des messages sécurisés sur Internet.
short.it: Con SafeMessage, puoi scrivere messaggi sicuri su Internet.
short.ja: SafeMessageを使用すると、インターネット上で安全なメッセージを書くことができます。
short.nl: Met SafeMessage kunt u veilige berichten op internet schrijven.
short.pl: Dzięki SafeMessage możesz pisać bezpieczne wiadomości w Internecie.
short.ru: С помощью SafeMessage вы можете писать безопасные сообщения в Интернете.
short.tr: SafeMessage ile internette güvenli mesajlar yazabilirsiniz.
short.uk: З SafeMessage ви можете писати безпечні повідомлення в інтернеті.
short.vi: Với SafeMessage, bạn có thể viết tin nhắn an toàn trên Internet.
short.zh_CN: 使用SafeMessage，您可以在互联网上撰写安全消息。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: With SafeMessage you can write secure messages on the Internet.
long.de:
With SafeMessage you can write and read secure messages on the Internet. Our extension offers an easy way to encrypt and decrypt texts to protect your communication.

How does SafeMessage work?

Generate key:
Click on the “Generate key” button to create a unique encryption key. This key is used to encrypt and decrypt messages.
Keep this key safe. If you lose it, you will no longer be able to decrypt your messages.

Set pattern:
Enter a pattern (e.g. &&&) that is used to identify your encrypted messages. This pattern is inserted before and after the encrypted message and enables the extension to automatically recognize and decrypt the encrypted texts.

Save:
Save the key and pattern so that SafeMessage works.

Encrypt message:
Enter the text you wish to encrypt in the input field.
Click on “Encrypt” to encrypt the text. The encrypted text is displayed in the output field and can be copied and forwarded. Never enter the text in an input field on a website as it can already be read there.

Decrypt message:
Decryption works automatically on most sites. However, you can also copy the encrypted text into the output field and click on “Decrypt”. 

Data protection and security
No external resources: Our extension does not load any external resources. All operations and data processing take place locally in your browser.
No data processing: We do not process any personal data. All encryption and decryption processes take place exclusively on your device. No data is transferred to our servers or to third parties.
